channel.title: Strafe Camera Bob?
channel.description:
Does anyone know how to make the camera "bob" when you move to the left or right in Source? If you need to know what I'm talking about, Black Mesa even has it. You can find a video featuring it [url='https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=o7iXwSJeuqM&context=C4ddaa6cADvjVQa1PpcFNJ_RKpWi9J3uml-AJXyP0U_6-gCQtajZA=']here[/url]. I believe there are other videos that feature it as well. For example, there's one that uses it on [url='https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=M2L4yzZEUKE']Half-Life: Uplink[/url]. If this can be done through a console command, that would be great. But if I must edit some files, I need some easy to follow instructions because I'm not a programmer :smiley:
Thanks!
